text: Jofuska Creek' is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. It is a tributary to the Pearl River. Jofuska is a name derived from the Choctaw language of uncertain meaning. Variant names are "Hurricane Creek", "Jofusha Creek" and "Smallwood Branch". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Neshoba County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Winston County, Mississippi Category:Tributaries of the Pearl River (Mississippi–Louisiana)
title: Jofuska Creek
